cities.name: Ciryx-Tor
cities.description: A tech-megalopolis built around a quantum core. Known for its knowledge temples, AI councils, and vertical gardens.

cities.name: Elython Verge
cities.description: Located deep beneath the Ice Cradle, this city is made entirely of living crystal and serves as a retreat for mystics and scientists.

cities.name: Lume’karr
cities.description: A floating city suspended by anti-grav fields. Famous for cloud-walking platforms and atmospheric resorts.

cities.name: Tyrax Null
cities.description: Zerion’s power capital, orbiting close to the sun. Entire city harnesses solar flares to power the planet's slipstream network.
